description:
This course is offered to assist authors who love writing but don't know where to go from there. Perhaps they have their manuscripts on the shelves but don't know what to do to get published. This course will guide writers into fine tuning their manuscript, submitting their finished manuscripts to publishers and then marketing your book. What is covered in this "Writing A to Z" course is:

  1. Course instruction guides writers on fine tuning their manuscript by suggestions on what can make the story better, such as: having a beta reader read their story and give them their ideas and/or hiring a professional editor.
  2. Course instruction guides writers toward finding a publisher, whether traditional or through self publishing routes.
  3. Course instruction guides the writer about the visual aspects of the book.
  4. Lecture on ways to promote a book, once it is in print format using different mediums.
  5. Lecture gives a list of marketing strategies to students on places they can market their book and things they can do to present their brand to readers.
title: Full Speed Ahead
